Hi there,

we had the same requirement.
We solved the problem by creating a wrapper class arround selenium,
which writes a log message and then delegates to the original
selenium.
We also handle failure cases and create a screenshot.
In our case we wrote the wrapper by hand.
It's probably better to use a generic approach with AspectJ, dynamic
proxies, generated subclasses or whatever.

Greetings,
   Malte
